extends java.lang.Object

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getHasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
      Returns true if the authority says we have this permission or false if the permission is denied or not set
      boolean getHasPermission(java.lang.String permission, boolean defaultValue)
      Returns true if the authority says we have this permission or if the permission is not specified by the authority returns the default value
      java.lang.String getModName() 
      boolean getPermissionSet(java.lang.String permission)
      Returns true if the specified permission is set in this permission container
      long getReplicationTime()
      Get the time that this object was received from the remote authority
      void invalidate()
      Forcibly invalidate this permission container, forces update at the next opportunity
      boolean isValid()
      True if this permissions object is valid (within cache period)
      void notifyRefreshPending()
      Temporarily forces the permissions object to be valid to prevent repeated revalidation
